attributes.action: Get rid of car insurance and tax, bring in life insurance!
attributes.additional_details: Do we actually know who is running these insurance company's or is it just a scam to make you pay £3,000 to get insured to get to work everyday? In all honesty I'd rather pay the government and only the government. Having my life insurance covering all costs. Don't pay life insurance don't get seen for health checks. Simple... providing more money for research and better behaved children meaning a more enjoyable life meaning less road accidents, and less whip lash claims too!!!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
